meta.title: Valentin Bourgoin | CTO / CPO on-demand
meta.description: Passionate about Tech, Product and Sports, I help teams deliver and achieve their goals. I have been working for 12 years closely with Tech & Product teams. My background as an engineer gives me the opportunity to be involved in the technical direction while being obsessed with product quality and user experience.
